name: Click Click Click
description:
Click Click Click is a very simple idle clicker game. But don't worry, you will get a lot of fun and challenging gameplay!

Your goal is simple. You have to achieve a one octillion value. You can click or wait for an idle income. Buy upgrades, use prestige system to power up your stats and once you will be able to complete the goal!

Features:
  • A very simple but still challenging and addictive gameplay without anything unnecessary
  • Upgrades and prestige system with powerful bonuses
  • Nice minimalistic UI and pixel graphics
  • The game can be completed. Find the fastest way to do it!
  • Light and dark themes are included
  • Calm ambient music with different tracks
  • Only one super achievement for the most hardcore players!

Click Click Click is as simple as possible. At the same time it is what you need to relax and get maximum fun!
